metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24654 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In KDE Ark before 20.08.1, a crafted TAR archive with symlinks can install files outside the extraction directory, as demonstrated by a write operation to a user's home directory.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24654` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ark - 4:15.12.3-0ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ark package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4:15.12.3-0ubuntu1.2').
